members.member: The overlapping body or area. Can be null if the object was created with [method SGPhysics3DServer.collision_object_create].
The RID of the overlapping body or area.
The overlapping shape, either a [SGCollisionShape3D] or [SGCollisionPolygon3D] node. Can be null if the shape was created with [method SGPhysics3DServer.shape_create].
The RID of the overlapping shape.
